attributes.action: Enforce Virgin Trains to reinstate 87030 'Black Douglas' and Mk3 stock on the West Coast Main Line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 87030, or indeed any other class 87 should be brought back into passenger revenue earning service on the West Coast Main Line, and Pendolinos should be put into storage.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
